name: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz
main_interests: Mathematics, physics, geology, medicine, biology, embryology, epidemiology, veterinary medicine, paleontology, psychology, engineering, linguistics, philology, sociology, metaphysics, ethics, economics, diplomacy, history, politics, music theory, poetry, logic, theodicy, universal language
thesis1_title: De Arte Combinatoria'' (''On the Combinatorial Art'')
thesis2_title: Disputatio Inauguralis de Casibus Perplexis in Jure'' (''Inaugural Disputation on Ambiguous Legal Cases'')
doctoral_advisor: Bartholomäus Leonhard Schwendendörffer (Dr. jur. advisor)   MathGenealogy
notable_students: Christian Wolff (epistolary correspondent), Jacob Bernoulli (epistolary correspondent)
